pages.text: $(li)The Respiration enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet.$(br)$(li)This enchantment extends the amount of time than you can spend under water without breath.
pages.title: Respiration

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_respiration)Ancient Tome (Respiration)$(/l).
